short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Assign AI is a chrome extension that helps you to be more productive

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Assign-AI introduces an Autonomous Task Assistant designed to streamline operations for small business owners, freelancers, and startups. This AI-driven software robot learns from user actions via screen recording, handling tasks from accounting to marketing or anything else with ease. It features a learning mode for continuous improvement, an execution mode for autonomous task performance, and robust safety protocols to protect sensitive data. With capabilities for web automation and a user-friendly chat interface, it offers a cost-effective, time-saving solution adaptable to any software environment. Ideal for businesses seeking efficiency without the need for additional staff, our AI evolves with your needs, ensuring seamless integration into various workflows.
